Vahram would like a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer and fuel. According to his business plan, he expects the family income to increase by five percent with this investment. He is pleased with the high quality and terms and conditions of microfinance services.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer and fuel.

loans.name: Najmiddin

texts.ru: Нажмиддин 1950 года рождения, имеет  7 детей. Нажмиддин работает фельдшером в центре здоровья в своем кишлаке. Его жена работает там же санитаркой.Для того  чтобы прокормить свою большую семью,Нажмиддин не ограничивается только работой.Кроме своей работы,он дома разводит скот. У него 10 голов коз и 10 голов овец. Нажмиддин планирует увеличить за лето своё стадо. Дети целый день ухаживают за скотом, пока Нажмиддин с женой на работе. Всю свою жизнь он разводит скот, и не бросает свою любимую работу в центре здоровья.
texts.en: Najmiddin was born in 1950. He has 7 children. Najmiddin works as a medic at a health centre in his village, where his wife also works as a nurse. In order to feed his large family, Najmiddin goes beyond working at his job and also raises livestock at home. He has 10 goats and 10 sheep, and is planning to increase the size of his herd over the summer. During the day, while Najmiddin and his wife are at work, their children take care of the animals. Najmiddin has been raising livestock all his life, but is also not giving up the work he loves at the health centre.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Maksim Sloyan

texts.en:
Maksim is from the village of Hacik in the Shirak region of Armenia. He is married with a one-year-old daughter. Maksim has a high school education and has been farming for the past eight years. In addition to supporting his family, he also helps his uncle’s family. He considers himself a hardworking and honest person.

He would like a loan to purchase potato seeds and fertilizer. Maksim expects this investment to increase the family's income by thirty percent. He is saving money for his daughter’s education and would like to continue growing his business. Maksim is pleased with the favorable conditions of microfinance and the good service.

loans.use: to purchase potato seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Mariano Prieto

texts.es:
El señor Mariano de 35 años de edad estuvo casado 8 años, pero en la actualidad es separado. Tiene 3 hijos que están viviendo con él.
El sr. Mariano se dedica al macate (Venta ambulante) desde hace 1 año, estuvo trabajando varias años como empleado y luego de juntar un pequeño capital se decidió a  trabajar por cuenta propia, sus ventas las realiza por la zona de Repatriación y Caaguazú para eso cuenta con una moto en la cual repartes sus productos, en este lapso ya cuenta con varios clientes formados gracias al buen trato que ofrece a sus clientes.
 Solicita este préstamo para la compra de olla de hierro, sartén, colcha, sabana, licuadora, ventilador, edredón, hamaca y otros artículos que le permitirá ofrecer  a sus clientes y poder mejorar su ingreso mensual.
texts.en:
35-year-old Mariano was married for eight years, but he's currently separated. He has three children who live with him.
Mariano has been a street vendor for one year. He worked as an employee for many years and, after saving up a small working capital, he decided to work on his own account. He makes his sales in the Repatriación and Caaguazú area. In order to do that, he owns a motorcycle which he uses to deliver his merchandise. During the time he's been in the business he already got a regular clientele, thanks to the good service he provides to his customers.
He requests the loan in order to purchase iron pots, pans, quilts, sheets, blenders, fans, comforters, hammocks and other items. He will be able to offer them to his customers and increase his monthly income.

loans.use: to purchase iron pots, pans, quilts, sheets, blenders, fans, comforters, hammocks, etc.

loans.name: Davaasuren

texts.en:
Davaasuren is a 36-year-old woman who lives with her husband and daughter in Huvsgul Province in Northern Mongolia. Her husband is employed, and her daughter goes to kindergarten. She has been running a taxi service business since 2010. She used to live in the countryside, working as a herder. She also has previous driving experience. Now she drives to the capital city from the province. It has been a profitable business since she started, and she plans to further improve her household. 

Davaasuren is a responsible and talented driver who says, "I would like to expand my business activity by having my van repaired. Due to the bad roads, my car has been broken down and needs to be repaired." The total amount she is requesting is 400,000 MNT to purchase a new motor for her car.

loans.use: to purchase a new motor for her car.

loans.name: Marcia Limbania

texts.es:
La señora Marcia  tiene 33 años de edad y vive en una casa de su propiedad vivienda que está ubicada en un barrio  de la ciudad de Tarija. Marcia es casada y tiene tres hijos a quienes cuida y ayuda en su educación junto con su esposo quien no participa del crédito por no encontrarse en esta ciudad, Marcia desde hace varios años que se dedica a la elaboración de repostería en general. Ahora ella tiene que trabajar para poder salir adelante junto  hijos. Marcia desde hace  6 años que se dedica a esa actividad siendo una persona muy conocida por sus clientes que solicitan sus productos, Marcia quiere tener mejores ingresos para salir adelante, pero ella nos cuenta que tiene la necesidad de comprar insumos como ser harina, manteca, azúcar,  ya que tiene varios contratos para realizar. De esa forma poder  terminar lo más antes posible pedidos  que tiene por hacer como ella ya tiene experiencia en el rubro.
 El crédito será destinado para la compra de dichos  insumos  que es necesario para realizar su actividad para de ese modo poder incrementar sus ingresos económicos.                                                                                                                                                                                                        Marcia nos cuenta que quiere mejorar las condiciones de vida que tiene, por eso nos dice que el próximo crédito que solicite será para mejorar las condiciones de la casa donde vive.
texts.en:
Marcia is 33 years old and lives in her own house which is located in a neighborhood of the town of Tarija. Marcia is married and has three children whom she, along with her husband, cares and provides education for. Her husband is not a recipient of the loan because he's not currently in town. Marcia has been making pastries in general for several years. Now she has to work in order to get herself and her children ahead. Marcia has been in this line of work for 6 years and she's very well-known to her customers who request her products. Marcia wishes to get better profits so that she can get ahead. However, she tells us that she needs to buy supplies such as flour, butter and sugar, because she has many orders to meet. That way she will be able to finish her pending orders as soon as possible, since she already has experience in the business.
The loan will be used to purchase said supplies, which she needs for her business, so that she can increase her profits.
Marcia tells us that she wishes to improve her living conditions, and for that reason she says that the next loan she requests will be for making home improvements.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as flour, butter and sugar for making pastries.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
This is Edwin, a 53-year-old resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines. He is married to Criselda, a housewife and mother to their children. He, together with his wife and children, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, he is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Edwin operates a food stall. He cooks breakfast meals like congee, a mixture of glutinous rice, eggs or chicken, and spices, along with other breakfast meals that he offers. He buys his ingredients early in the morning and prepares them for his customers upon order. His regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. He earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.

To help him continue operating his business, he is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP. He will utilize the loan to buy greater quantities of products like meats, rice, vegetables, condiments, and seasonings. He expects a boost in his income as he expands his business. 

Edwin hopes to grow his business in the coming years, just as he hopes to support his children's schooling up to the college level. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of his work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for raw ingredients and products needed in his business.

loans.name: Gabriel Yasmani

texts.es:
GABRIEL YASMANI tiene 25 años de edad es soltero tiene un hijo, vive con el hijo de 6 años de edad en Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

GABRIEL YASMANI se dedica a realizar trabajos de construcción el es Albañil. Solicita el crédito para comprar herramientas como taladro, pala, espátula, mezcladora pequeña. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar las herramientas que le hacen falta.

Las compras lo hara en Guaranda. El sueño es comprarse un carro. El desafío al que se enfrenta es poder realizar la terminación de la casa.

En el tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión.
texts.en:
Gabriel Yasmani is 25 years old and single. He has a 6-year-old son who lives with him in Ventanas, in the province of Los Ríos.
Gabriel Yasmani is a bricklayer who does construction work. He requests the loan in order to purchase tools such as a drill, a shovel, a spatula and a small mixer.
With the help from the loan, he will be able to buy the tools he so needs.
He will purchase them in Guaranda. His dream is to buy himself a car. The challenge he faces is being able to finish the construction of the house.
In his free time, he enjoys watching television.

loans.use: to purchase tools such as a drill, a shovel, a spatula and a small mixer.

loans.name: Norma Alicia

texts.es:
Norma Alicia tiene 52 años de edad es soltera tiene un hijo, vive con el nieto y el hijo de 26 años de edad en Ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Norma es profesora de primaria da clases en una escuela del sector .  Solicita el crédito para  poder  comprar medicina. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar la medicación y combatir la enfermedad.

Las compras la realiza en las naves. El sueño es poder comprar un carro. El desafío al que se enfrenta es ser eficiente en el trabajo.
En el tiempo libre le gusta leer.
texts.en:
Norma Alicia, 52, is single and has a son who is 26. She lives with him and her grandson in Ventanas, Los Rios province. 

Norma teaches at a local elementary school. She is asking for a loan so that she can buy medicine. The loan will allow her to buy the medicine and beat the disease.

She makes her purchases at the warehouse. Her dream is to be able to buy a car. Her challenge is being efficient in her work.

In her free time she likes to read.

loans.use: to buy medicine.

loans.name: Javzmaa Tserenbaljir

texts.en:
Javzmaa is a forty-year-old woman who lives with her husband and seven children in Selenge province in Northern Mongolia. Her husband works as a driver for a private company. Her seven children study at college, high school and kindergarten. 

She has been running a garment retail business since 2001. She brings her supplies from China and trades them at the well-positioned shop counter. She has made a number of regular customers in the village. She has a plan to expand the business activity further. 

Javzmaa is a good-natured woman who says, "I would like to expand the business activity by purchasing the supplies in large quantities, so that I would not waste money for the transportation expenses and could save for my children." The total amount she is requesting is 1,800,000 MNT to purchase the garments.

loans.use: to purchase garments.

loans.name: Agbara Oluwa Okpo Group

texts.fr: AGBARA OLUWA OKPO est un groupe composé de quatre personnes qui résident dans la même localité. Le représentant du groupe du nom de Akisokpè Elidja (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgé de 39 ans. Akisokpè Elidja est marié à une marchande du nom de Marcelline et a sept enfants à charge, dont trois sont ses propres enfants. Parmi les enfants, certains sont scolarisés. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la famille. Akisokpè Elidja a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire et a appris ensuite la soudure. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Akisokpè Elidja exerce cette activité depuis dix sept ans, ce qui lui permet d’apporter une aide significative à sa famille. Akisokpè Elidja s’approvisionne au Nigéria. Dans le but de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle de plus en plus nombreuses et de se faire plus de profit, Akisokpè Elidja sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AGBARA OLUWA OKPO un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The AGBARA OLUWA OKPO group consists of four people who live in the same locality.

The group's representative, Akisokpè Elidja (raising his hand in the photo), is 39 years old. He is married to a retailer named Marcelline and has seven children in his care, three of whom are his own children. Some of the children attend school. The couple jointly takes care of the family's various expenses.

Akisokpè Elidja left school at the secondary level and learned the trade of welding.  In order to cover his various expenses, he has been working as a welder for the past seventeen years, which enables him to take good care of his family's needs.  He buys his supplies in Nigeria.

In order to better meet the needs of an increasing number of customers, and also to increase his profits, Akisokpè Elidja is requesting a third loan from ALIDé, together with the other members of the AGBARA OLUWA OKPO group.  Previous loans have been well repaid.

loans.use: to buy welding rods and other supplies for welding.

loans.name: Edwige Laure

texts.fr:
Edwige est une jeune femme âgée de 39 ans, célibataire ayant 3 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 5 et 10 ans, et tous vont déjà l'école. Elle a une fabrique de beignet dans un marché à Yaoundé depuis 2 ans. Elle dispose dans sa fabrique d'une machine à pétrir et sollicite le crédit pour acheter une machine à rouler la patte afin de maximiser la production et de minimiser les couts. Actuellement, elle a des vendeurs payés à la commission qui livrent dans des boutiques du quartier.

Elle voudrait dans l'avenir faire des livraisons même dans les boulangeries de la place dans lesquelles la demande est plus élévée.
texts.en:
Edwige is a young woman of 39 years. She is single and has three children whose ages range from 10 to 5 years old. They already all attend school.

For the last two years she has been running a doughnut manufacturing business in a market in Yaounde. In her manufacturing plant she has a dough kneading machine and she is requesting a loan to buy a dough rolling machine in order to maximize her production and minimize the costs. She currently has sellers who are paid on commission and deliver to shops in the neighborhood.

In the future, she would like to make deliveries in the town’s bakeries where the demand is higher.

loans.use: to purchase a new machine to roll dough.

loans.name: Benettor

texts.en: Benettor is 36 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married with three children between the ages of 7 and 20. She stopped her education in the 10th grade. Her husband is an electrician. For the past 8 years, she has been selling rice, oil, and pepper in the market, She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, oil, and pepper for her business. Her plans is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, and pepper for her business

loans.name: Jinny Mae

texts.en:
Jinny Mae is a young entrepreneur from Trinidad, Bohol. She is only 20 years old and has 2 children aged 2 and 8 months.

Jinny Mae runs a vulcanizing shop with her husband. They have had this business for 5 years. According to Jinny, they earn about 4,000 PHP per month with this business. Jinny applied for a loan to purchase vulcanizing tools. Jinny is hoping for their business to grow. She plans to go back to school and finish her studies. Jinny is also saving for her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase vulcanizing tools

loans.name: Purevsuren Gombosuren

texts.en: Purevsuren is a 31-year-old man who lives with his wife in Huvsgul province in Northern Mongolia. He has been running a garment retail business with his wife and also a taxi service. He brings the products from China and his wife stays at the shop counter selling the garments. Meanwhile, he runs his taxi service business, driving to the capital city and the neighbor provinces. But due to the unpaved roads in rural areas, the car has broken down and it needs to be repaired. If he cannot repair the car, both businesses would stop. Purevsuren is a diligent man who says that "I would like to continue the business activity by repairing my car so that I could bring the supplies and continue the taxi service business". The total amount he is requesting is 2,500,000 MNT to buy spare parts for his car repairs.

loans.use: To buy spare parts

loans.name: Lhamsuren

texts.en: Lhamsuren is a 65-year-old widowed woman who lives with her daughter in Huvsgul province in Northern Mongolia. Her daughter is 21 years old and employed. She has been running a garment retail business since 2000. She started the business in the shop counter of the biggest trade center in the town. She became experienced on the field. She has many regular customers and plans to expand the business activity by increasing the types. Lhamsuren is a smart lady who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by purchasing the garments in large quantities so that I could raise the income". The total amount she is requesting is 2,500,000 MNT which she will use to purchase more garments.

loans.use: To purchase more garments

loans.name: Sègbégnon Bernadette

texts.fr: Sègbégnon Bernadette est âgée de 33 ans et vit au Bénin. Sègbégnon Bernadette est mariée à un certain Gabriel.  Sègbégnon Bernadette a très peu fréquenté, mais a appris la coiffure. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains sont scolarisés. En dehors de leurs enfants, le couple a un autre enfant à leur charge. Sègbégnon Bernadette et son mari assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Sègbégnon Bernadette exerce le métier de coiffure depuis quatorze ans environs. Cette activité lui permet ainsi de satisfaire aux besoins de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses besoins. Sègbégnon Bernadette désire mieux équiper son atelier de coiffure par l’acquisition d’un séchoir et des produits de cheveux ; ce qui lui permettra de répondre efficacement aux exigences de sa clientèle. Pour cette raison, Sègbégnon Bernadette sollicite pour la troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers crédits ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Sègbégnon Bernadette is 33 years old and lives in Benin.  She is married to a man named Gabriel.  She has only attended school for a very short period of time, but has learned the trade of hair-dressing. Sègbégnon Bernadette and Gabriel have four children, some of whom attend school.  Besides their own children, the couple has another child in their care.  Sègbégnon Bernadette and her husband jointly take care of the various household expenses.

In order to cope with her various expenses, Sègbégnon Bernadette has been working as a hairdresser for about fourteen years.  Thanks to this activity she is able to provide for her children and for herself.

Sègbégnon Bernadette would like to better equip her hair-dressing salon through the purchase of a hair dryer and other hair care products.  Those purchases will enable her to efficiently meet the needs of her customers.  For this reason, she is requesting a third loan from ALIDé.  Her two previous loans have been well repaid.

loans.use: to buy a hair dryer and other hair care products.

loans.name: Americo

texts.en:
Americo and his partner together operate a number of small businesses to support themselves and their four-year-old. In total, the couple have about five small carts from which they sell everything from quail eggs to jean pants to jewelry. Americo typically travels on weekends from Saturday to Sunday in order to sell merchandise from Cusco in smaller towns such as Sicuani.

Americo would like a loan in order to purchase more merchandise for his businesses, primarily quail eggs and earrings at wholesale. He and his partner would like to own a stand in the future, and perhaps open a store outside of Cusco city where Americo currently travels to sell merchandise. 

Americo is a member of the village bank "El Amanecer" in Cusco, which is receiving its 22nd loan from Asociación Arariwa.

loans.use: to purchase quail eggs and earrings for his businesses

loans.name: Gantsetseg Sharav

texts.en: Gantsetseg is a 39-year-old woman who lives with her husband and three children in Selenge province in Northern Mongolia. Two of her children study at the secondary school and the youngest one is three years old. She has been running a garment retail business since 2010. She has been running the business with her husband. They deliver the products with their own van from the border city. But due to the bad roads, the van has been broken and it needs to be replaced. Therefore in order to continue running the business, they need to replace the van. They plan to buy a sedan with the loan and their saved money. Gantsetseg is a smart lady who says.  "I would like to expand the business activity by having a sedan so that I and my husband continue the business between the border cities and improve the household". The total amount she is requesting is 3,500,000 MNT to buy a new car.

loans.use: To buy a new car

loans.name: Rahmajon

texts.ru: Рахматчон мужчина 40 лет, женат и имеет шестерых детей.Его жена домохозяйка. В своей местности он знаменитый электрик,у него очень много клиентов . Также он имеет не большую землю , где посеял укроп и петрушку, которую будет продавать на рынке его жена. Он также имеет свой бизнес ,по откорму и продажи скота. На приобретенный  кредит он хочет купить две молодые коровы, и откормив их продать за хорошую цену.
texts.en: Rahmajon is a 40 year old man, he is married and has six children. His wife is a homemaker. He is a well known electrician in his neighborhood and has very many clients. He also has a small plot of land where he planted dill and parsley which his wife will sell on the market. He also has his own business feeding and selling livestock. He wants to use the loan to buy two young cows and sell them for a good price after fattening.

loans.use: to buy two cows.

loans.name: Nawal Group

texts.en:
Nawal is a 51-year-old married woman and mother of three children. Nawal has worked as a tailor for 10 years. She started her business to help her husband make a living and raise their children. She stopped working for a few years when she found out that her children needed a lot of care and attention, but two years ago Nawal felt lonely since all of her children got married and she was left alone during the day busy with nothing to prepare for the kids who were supposed to be back home for lunch or dinner.

So working again was the best thing for her to improve her social life in addition to supporting her family again with additional income for whoever needs help. She is very happy that she took this path again, and she is willing to open a big factory in the future. Today, Nawal is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, in order to buy a new and improved tailoring machine capable of doing a lot of work in a very short amount of time with especially good quality.

Khadija is a 25-year-old married woman and mother of three gorgeous children who fill her whole life, and for whom she sacrifices hers in order to please them and provide them with the best living ever. Three years ago, Khadija started to work as a hairdresser. She faced a lot of problems and complaints from her husband at the beginning since he refused to let her work and start her own business. But at the same time, she had her husband's family's support, which helped a lot in taking the first step. Her business started at home, since her husband spends most of his time away and she had to fill her free time and at the same time stay next to her children. Most of her customers are friends, relatives and neighbors. Khadija is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, in order to buy necessary hair colors, a new hairdryer and necessary hair dressing tools to improve her business. She hopes that one day she will open her own beauty salon and all of her customers will support her there too since they are very loyal to her. She is sure that her husband, although he refused at the beginning, is very proud of her now.

Zalfa is a 43-year-old married woman and mother of three children. Zalfa has been working in the Mouneh business for 13 years. She inherited her business from her mother who used to do it in her village. That's what encouraged her to start this business in her husband's village. Zalfa makes jam, she prepares Mouneh during the summer months to be consumed during winter’s harsh days. This way of preserving food helps foods to live a longer life. The Mouneh food has started in time to be a basic food for most of the Lebanese. Her business is improving and now is the suitable time to start working since everything is almost available to start preparing. That's why, to be ready for customers' replies, Zalfa is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, in order to buy necessary goods such as vegetables, fruits and seeds , to start her preparations.

loans.use: To purchase a tailoring machine

loans.name: Milly

texts.en:
Milly lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has six children, all of whom are in school. She doesn't take care of additional family members. Milly has a beauty salon. She has been in this business for eight years and she works 7 days out of every week.  Milly sells her products in a shop, by means of retail. Milly has requested a loan of 500,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more boxes of cream relaxers, weaves and braids.    
 
The main business challenge(s) for Milly include the rainy season and defaulters. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to own a fully stocked beauty salon and to have a permanent place for her salon. Milly lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity and piped water.  Her major monthly expenses include food, rent and school fees.

loans.use: To buy more boxes of cream relaxers, weaves and braids

loans.name: Khvicha Inauri

texts.en:
Khvicha is 32 years old. He lives in a small village in the Gori district with his family: parents and younger sister (a student). The family earns a living through an agricultural business. They run a dairy farm with five milk cows and three calves. They sell on average 100 kg of cheese per month in the village. Along with the dairy farm, the family has 2.3 hectares of land where plum, peach and apple trees are grown. Khvicha sells the harvested fruits in the village to local greengrocery retailers. The total average monthly income of the family is 480 Laris.

Khvicha requested credit for purchasing fertilizers and drugs for treating the plants from parasites. After properly completed seasonal work, the family will get a good harvest and sell harvested products for convenient price. It will be positively reflected on the family income and they will be able to improve the family members’ living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and drugs for treating his plants against parasites

loans.name: Comlan Irenée

texts.fr: Comlan Irenée est âgé de 39 ans et vit au Bénin. Comlan Irenée est marié à Cathérine. Comlan Irenée a arrêté l'école au niveau secondaire, puis a appris la photographie. Le couple a cinq enfants à charge, dont trois sont ses propres enfants. Tous les enfants du couple sont scolarisés. Comlan Irenée et sa femme assurent ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Comlan Irenée exerce le métier de photographie depuis quinze ans environs. Cette activité lui permet ainsi de satisfaire aux besoins de ses enfants et de subvenir à ses besoins. Comlan Irenée désire mieux équiper son atelier de photographie par l’acquisition d’un mini-labo ; ce qui lui permettra d'améliorer ses prestations. Pour cette raison, Comlan Irenée sollicite pour la deuxième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier crédit a été bien remboursé.
texts.en: Comlan Irenée is 39 years old and lives in Benin. Comlan Irenée is married to Catherine. Comlan Irenée stopped school at the secondary level, then learned photography. The couple has five children in their care, three of whom are their own. All of the couple's children are in school. Comlan Irenée and his wife provide for the various household expenses together. To cope with his various expenses, Comlan Irenée has worked as a photographer for around fifteen years. This business allows him to satisfy the needs of his children and to provide for his own needs. Comlan Irenée wants to better equip his photography studio by acquiring a mini lab. This will allow him to improve his performance. For this reason, Comlan Irenée is asking for a loan from Alidé for the second time. His first loan was fully repaid.

loans.use: to buy a mini-lab for photography.

loans.name: Evènassé François

texts.fr: Evènassé François est âgé de 38 ans et vit au Bénin. Evènassé François est marié à Christine. Le couple a cinq enfants à leur charge dont quatre sont leurs propres enfants. Parmi les enfants, certains sont scolarisés. Evènassé François vit ensemble avec  ses  enfants et sa femme et assure ensemble avec sa femme les diverses charges de la maison. Pour subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Evènassé François mène comme activité l'activité de forgeron et d'ajustage. De façon secondaire, Evènassé François vend des jus de bissap, de la glace, etc. dans son quartier. Evènassé François exerce cette activité passionnément depuis près de dix ans. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Evènassé François contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa famille.Evènassé François  s’approvisionne au Bénin et au Nigéria. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Evènassé François sollicite pour une troisième fois un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement par Evènassé François ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: Evènassé François is 38 years old and lives in Benin. Evènassé François is married to Christine. The couple has five children in their care, four of whom are their own. Some of the children are in school. Evènassé François lives together with his children and his wife and provides for the various household expenses together with his wife. To meet his needs and those of his children, Evènassé François works as a blacksmith and adjuster. Secondarily, Evènassé François sells bissap juice (a sweet juice made with hibiscus), ice cream, etc. in his area. Evènassé François has been in this business for nearly ten years. Thanks to the revenue that this business generates, Evènassé François contributes to the various expenses of his family. Evènassé François stocks up in Benin and in Nigeria. To satisfy the needs of his growing number of customers, Evènassé François is asking for a third loan from Alidé. His past loans were repaid in full.

loans.use:
Acheter des meules, poste à soudure, sucre, arômes, feuilles de bissap.
To buy grinding stones, a welder, sugar, flavorings, hibiscus flowers.

loans.name: Asunta

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida,la socia prepara diferentes platos como pollo al horno con papas fritas,la socia sigue vendiendo en el mercado desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos para cocinar como carne,pollo y verduras.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues working in her food business.  She prepares different dishes such as oven-baked chicken with fries.  She continues selling her products in the market from 7.00am to 8.00pm.  Through this business she provides for her children.  She is requesting this loan to buy ingredients such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

The member is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as meat, chicken and vegetables

loans.name: Patricia Veronica

texts.es:
Patricia, se dedica a la venta de huevos, ella es madre soltera, vive con su abuelo y su hija de 5 años de edad, desde hace 6 años se dedica al negocio y lo heredo de su madre, manteniendo los cuidados de la granja de pollos, de la cual recibe los huevos para la venta.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales para la reparación de la cerca en la granja, como madera, maya, y tambien comprara concentrado, esto le dará mayor seguridad y poder mejorar la productividad del negocio. 
La aspiración de Patricia es tener una granja amplia, para generar mayor producción de huevos, que le dará más seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Patricia sells eggs for a living.  She is a single mother and lives with her grandfather and five-year-old daughter.  For six years she has been in the business she inherited from her mother, taking care of her chicken farm which provides the eggs she sells.

She is requesting a loan to buy materials to repair the farm fence, such as wood and wire mesh, and also will buy concentrated animal feed.  The investment will provide more security and improve production.

Patricia aspires to having a larger farm so she can produce more eggs and stabilize her economy.

loans.use: To buy concentrated animal feed, wood and wire mesh.

loans.name: Edic Montano Torrentes

texts.es:
Eddy es un señor de 64 años de edad,  vive con su familia en una comunidad llamada Rincón Grande de Pavas, en la provincia de San Jose, capital de Costa Rica. En esta zona cuenta con una amplia gama de hoteles y le ofrece al turista museos, restaurantes, parques, centros de conferencias, modernos centros comerciales, cines, teatros, galerías y mucha y variada diversión nocturna. 

Dentro de las principales atracciones culturales se encuentra el Teatro Nacional, situado en la Plaza de la Cultura e inaugurado en 1897, el Museo del Oro, el Museo de Arte y Diseño Contemporáneo y el Museo de los Niños. Algunas de las más famosas fiestas y celebraciones de la provincia de San José son las fiestas populares de fin y principio de cada año, el Festival de La Luz, en el mes de diciembre y la exposición nacional de orquídeas, en el mes de marzo.

Eddy trabaja como taxista pero con un carro alquilado,y ahora quiere comprar un automóvil para seguir trabajando en el mismo negocio pero con la posibilidad de obtener mayores ingresos al tener su propio taxi.
Es por esto que  Eddy está  solicitando el monto de quinientos mil colones (¢500.000) para la compra del automóvil, ya que de esta  forma estará  mejorando bastante la calidad de vida propia y la de su familia.
Eddy  es miembro de la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Rincón Grande S.A, este será su segundo préstamo razón por la cual está  muy agradecido  por las oportunidades  de acceso al crédito que se le brinda y de esta forma  poder llevar a cabo los proyectos que planea.
texts.en:
Eddy is a 64-year-old gentleman who lives with his family in a community called Rincón Grande de Pavas, in San José province, the capital of Costa Rica.  This area has a wide range of hotels and offers tourists museums, restaurants, parks, conference centers, modern shopping malls, cinemas, theatres, art galleries and a lot of nightlife.

Some of the main cultural attractions are the National Theatre, which is located in Plaza de la Cultura and was opened in 1897; the Gold Museum; the Museum of Art and Contemporary Design; and the Children's Museum.  Some of the famous festivals and celebrations of San José are those held at the beginning and end of each year: the Light Festival in December and the National Exposition of Orchids in March.

Eddy works as a taxi driver but he rents the car he uses.  He would now like to buy a car so that he can continue working in the same business but make more income by working with his own taxi.

For this reason, Eddy is requesting a loan for 500,000 colones to buy a car.  This will improve his own quality of life and also that of his family.

Eddy is a member of Rincón Grande Community Loan Company Ltd. and this will be his second loan.  He is very grateful for the opportunities that he has had to access loans so that he can carry out the projects that he has planned.

loans.use: to buy a car to use as a taxi

loans.name: Isabel Mercedes

texts.es:
Isabel es una señora emprendedora, responsable en su trabajo y sobre todo muy estricta. Isabel tiene 48 años, vive con su esposo y una hija de 25 años en la ciudad de Ibarra que se encuentra en la Provincia de Imbabura.

Isabel trabaja en bordados de blusas, manteles, los cuales les lleva a vender en las ferias artesanales de la provincia. Es su octavo años solicitando créditos a Fodemi, el actual crédito que solicitó es para la compra de tela bretaña por metros e hilo por cajas para aumentar su producción y vender más, lo que ayudará a obtener más clientela y mejores ingresos económicos, que a su vez ayudaran a cubrir gastos de su hogar.

Isabel sueña con tener un atller en su casa.
texts.en:
Isabel is a responsible entrepreneur who is very strict.  She is 38, and lives with her husband and 25-year-old daughter in the city of Ibarra in the province of Imbabura.

Isabel embroiders blouses and tablecloths which she sells at the craft fairs in the province.  She is in her eighth year of receiving loans from Fodemi.  The current loan is to buy fabric by the meter and thread by the box to increase production and sales.  This will help attract more customers and improve her income, which will also cover household expenses.

Isabel dreams of having a workshop in her house.

loans.use: To buy fabric by the meter and thread by the box to increase production and sales.

loans.name: Americo Donato

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de hospedaje,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio de hospedaje el socio saca adelante a su hijo,el sueño del socio es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de hospedaje.El socio solicita el credito para comprar camas y sabanas.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member is still in the hotel business, working from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m., and through his work has been able to provide for his son.  His goal is to expand and improve his hotel activity.  He is requesting a loan to buy beds and sheets.  

He is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy beds and sheets.

loans.name: Warmicuna Llanqanchis Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal “Warmicuna Llanqanchis” está conformado por diez mujeres y un varón. La mayoría de los socios son amigos, compañeros de trabajo y vecinos que tienen una buena amistad. Algunos socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y otros viven en la ciudad de Anta.

Los socios son trabajadores y emprendedores que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos.  La mayoría de los socios se dedican a diferentes actividades económicas como crianza de animales menores, venta cosméticos, venta de verduras, venta de artesanía, venta de comestibles y otros brindan servicios. 

La socia Luciana tiene 45 años de edad, es casada y frutos de esta unión tiene cuatro hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Anta y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. Su actividad económica de Luciana es la venta de hortalizas pero también se dedica  a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes. En esta oportunidad Luciana requiere el préstamo para comprar animales menores como cuyes. 

(Los  socios aparecen  en dos grupos diferentes porque decidieron por unanimidad que la reunión por única vez y ultima vez se han en la ciudad del Cusco y Anta). 

(La socia que aparece en la parte inferior de la fotografía pidió permiso a la junta del banco comunal para no estar presentes el día del desembolso.)

Los socios agradecen y valoran el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y se comprometen en cumplir con el pago total de sus deudas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The 'Warmicuna Llanqanchis' community bank has eleven members: ten women and one man.  Most of the members are friends, work colleagues and neighbors who have a good friendship.  Some of the members live in the city of Cusco and others live in the city of Anta.

The members are all workers and entrepreneurs who are always looking for opportunities to make progress in life and, through their daily efforts, provide their children with a better future.  Most of the members work in different business activities such as raising animals, selling cosmetics, selling vegetables, selling handicrafts and selling food products.  Others provide services.

Luciana is a member of this group.  She is 45 years old, married, and has four children from her marriage.  She was born in the city of Anta and still lives in the city.  Her business activity is selling vegetables but she also raises guinea pigs.  On this occasion, Luciana needs a loan to buy guinea pigs.

n.b. The members appear in two different groups because they unanimously decided to have a meeting for one time and one time only in the cities of Cusco and Anta.  The member who appears at the bottom of the photo requested permission from the community bank's board to be absent on the day the loan was disbursed.

The members are grateful for the loan and value it.  They pledge to make their repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs

loans.name: Bayarmaa Munhjargal

texts.en:
Bayarmaa is a 42-year-old woman who lives with her husband and 3 children in Hovd province in Western Mongolia. Her husband is a carpenter. Two of her children study at the college and the youngest one studies at the high school. 

She started a retailing business in 1999, and since that time she has been selling felt made products and also food products. She trades the food products between March to November, and rest of the time she trades the felt made products and some wood carved items. 

Bayarmaa is a hardworking and a diligent woman who says, "I would like to expand the business activity by buying necessary materials like wood, and also food supplies." The total amount she is requesting is 2,000,000 MNT to buy the necessary materials and food supplies.

loans.use: To buy necessary materials and food supplies.

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en:
Mamie is 41 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married and has five children between the ages of 4 and 22. All of them are in school and live at home. She stopped her own education in the 11th grade.

For the past 15 years she been operating a cook shop (restaurant). She started this business with help from her father, and learned this way of selling from him. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase oil, onions, peppers, rice, charcoal and salt for her business. She likes her business because it helps her to save. Her plans are to build her house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase oil, onions, peppers, rice, charcoal and salt for her business.

loans.name: Lucia M.

texts.en: Lucia is 43 years old and lives in Buchanan. She is married and has 5  children between the ages of  6 and 26. All of them are in school and live at home. For the past 10 years she has been selling bitter ball (a type of eggplant), peppers, okra and eggplant in the local market. She is requesting a loan to purchase more bitter ball, peppers, okra and eggplant for her business. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more bitter ball, pepper, okra and eggplant for her business.

loans.name: Baigalmaa Baasanjav

texts.en:
Baigalmaa is a 31-year-old woman who lives with her husband and 3 children in Hovd province in Western Mongolia. Her husband works as a doorman and the kids go to the kindergarten. She has been running a retail garment business since 2009. She brings the supplies from Erlian city, China. Previously she used to work as a herder. Now she has many regular customers and the business has been successful in these years. 

Baigalmaa is a good natured woman who says, "I would like to expand the business by purchasing supplies in large quantities in different types so that I could save the transportation expenses and save for the future." The total amount she is requesting is 3,000,000 MNT to purchase her own stall.

loans.use: To purchase her own stall.

loans.name: Julia Group

texts.en:
Azhar is a 38-year-old married woman and the mother of four girls, the smallest of whom is 6 years old and the biggest is 17. Azhar opened a grocery store two years ago to help her husband  increase their income and to cover their daughters' needs. Her business is growing, and that's why she needs Al Majmoua, a Kiva partner's support, to buy necessary goods for the spring-summer season. Azhar is a hard worker. She developed her business a lot since she started and she is still willing to do as much as she can to provide her girls with the living they deserve to have. Azhar will buy soft drinks and ice cream, and these will help a lot in filling most customers' needs.

Layla is a 30-year-old married woman and the mother of three children (two girls and one boy). Her little girl is only seven months old and needs so much care. Layla is comfortable with her business because in the meantime she can take good care of her children from her house. She is a hairdresser well known in the region, and supported by most of her customers and family members. She is applying for a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, in order to buy necessary tools and hair colors requested in this business, in addition to paying for her children's school fees. She is very supportive of her husband and is willing to stay supportive, and she hopes to open her own beauty salon in the future.

Zeinab is a 46-year-old married woman and the mother of four children. She works from her house preparing food. Her catering business is very important, and she is developing it a lot since she has a lot of wedding and funeral requests to cover. It takes a lot of care for such a business to sprout a lot of good income in the future. Zeinab is requesting a loan from Kiva partner, Al Majmoua, in order buy necessary merchandise for her business to stay ready for any request in the coming days. She is a hard working woman who will invest the loan in buying herbs, rice and some necessary items that won't rot over time. She hopes to open her own restaurant or catering company in the future.

loans.use: To improve their businesses with necessary products requested.

loans.name: Bayarhuu

texts.en:
Bayarhuu is a 26 year old woman who lives with her husband and 3 children in Uvs province in Western Mongolia.  Her husband is employed and two of her children go to school. 

Bayarhuu has been running an eyeglass retails business since 2010.  Her business has been successful because she brings supplies in different styles and colors.  Therefore, she has made many regular customers in the town. 

With the upcoming summer months, the demand for sunglasses will increase.  She plans to purchase supplies from China. Bayarhuu is a good-natured woman who says that "I would like to expand the business activity by buying the sunglasses in different types and color, so that the customers would be satisfied with the diversity and I could raise my income".  The total amount she is requesting is 1,200,000 MNT.

loans.use: To buy the eyeglasses and sunglasses

loans.name: Cyrus Kariuki

texts.en: Cyrus is a 24 year old single man.  He describes himself to be a principled man.  He operates a retail store where he sells shoes. He has been involved in this business for one year and he employs 2 staff members.  His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be high prices of shoes.  He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more shoes for selling.  His business goal is to run a bigger shoe selling retail shop within 5 years.

loans.use: to buy more shoes for sale.

loans.name: Undarmaa

texts.en:
Undarmaa is 30 years old and lives with her husband and three children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. They live together in a small wooden house on her plot of land. Her children, ages 6 to 11, are all attending the local secondary school. She and her husband have been running a furniture making business since 2006. They buy materials such as plywood, planks, glue and wood processing equipments to make different household furniture for apartments and gers (a traditional Mongolian nomadic tent). Undarmaa sells the furniture at “Narantuul”, the biggest outdoor market in Ulaanbaatar city.

She wants to develop her business day by day. This time, she plans to increase her business by adding working capitals, anticipating a higher sales volume. Undarmaa thinks it will raise her family income in the future. The loan will be dedicated to purchase wood and other raw materials for her carpentry shop.

loans.use: To purchase the wood and other raw materials for her carpentry shop.

loans.name: Odonchimeg

texts.en:
Mrs. Odonchimeg, 35, is a hard-working mother who is trying to educate her children. She lives in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia with her husband, 39, and two children who are 18 and 16 years old. She has been running a business selling building materials in the market.

This time she is taking a loan to purchase some building materials, to increase her inventory and expand her sales volume. She believes it will increase her family's income, and her retail business earnings in the future. With the additional income, she hopes to pay for further education of her children.

loans.use: To purchase building materials for sale.

loans.name: Annah

texts.en:
Annah is a 50 year old married woman. She has 9 children with ages ranging from 20 years to 32 years. She describes herself to be social and talkative. She operates a grocery stall where she sells potatoes, kale, mangoes, avocadoes, tomatoes, water melons etc. She has been involved in this business for 10 years.

Annah's business is located within an urban area and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be perishability of fruits, since she has no proper storage facilities . She will use the Kes 10,000 loan to buy more avocadoes and potatoes. Her business goal is to run a wholesale green grocery store within 5 years.

loans.use: to buy more avocadoes and potatoes.

loans.name: Bonface

texts.en:
Bonface is a 27 year old married man. He has a son who is 2 years old. He describes himself to be social man. He operates a farm where he sells cows, sheep and goats. He has been involved in this business for 4 years and employs 1 staff member. His business is located within a busy town and his primary customers are local residents.

Bonface describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. He will use the Kes 10,000 loan to buy a cow. His dream and goal is to own a livestock slaughter house.

loans.use: to purchase one cow.

loans.name: Hilda Lucia

texts.es:
Hilda Lucía, tiene 33 años, de estado civil casada, vive en Guaranda, provincia de Bolívar vive con sus dos hijos y su esposo.

La VRC Arte y Cultura  “Wari” se encuentra en la comunidad de Larkaloma a 45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios.

Hilda se dedica  a la agricultura, siembre de papas y elaboración de quesos, además cría animales ganado y pollos.

Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos, cerdos, fertilizantesn urea, lìquidos para la maleza y así poder tener un propio negocio , las compras y las ventas  lo hace en Guaranda  de forma semanal.

Su sueño es tener un vehículo propio, ya que los desafíos a los se enfrentan diariamente son las malas vías de comunicación.
Su tiempo libre la dedica a hacer música, y la costumbre que más le gusta es el carnaval.
texts.en:
Hilda Lucía is 33 years old, married, and lives in Guaranda, in Bolívar province.  She lives with her husband and two children.

The "Wari" Art and Culture Community Bank is located in Larkaloma community, 45 minutes from the office.  It has 11 members.

Hilda works in agriculture.  She grows potatoes and makes cheese.  She also raises livestock and chickens.

Hilda is requesting this loan to buy chickens, pigs, fertilizers, urea and liquids for getting rid of weeds.  She makes her purchases and sales in Guaranda every week.

Hilda's dream is to own her own vehicle as the challenge that she faces on a daily basis is bad road links.

In her free time, Hilda enjoys playing music and the custom she most enjoys is Carnival.

loans.use: to buy chickens, pigs, fertilizers, urea and liquids for getting rid of weeds

loans.name: Doña Amelia Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Doña Amelia y  esta conformado por nueve mujeres trabajadoras y amables que se dedican diferentes actividades económicas, las integrantes de este grupo son de un pueblo llamado camotinchan donde   hay muchos árboles verdes y en el camino para llegar a la comunidad pasan por un rió que se despegan entres a ese lugar se le llama los tres es un rió grande y hermoso.
La mayoría de los hombres de la comunidad se dedican a la venta a la siembra de maiz, ajonjolin, chile y jitomate y las mujeres se dedican a la venta de pollo, calzado y carne de res.
La cultura de Camontinchan es que se celebra el carnaval los muchachos y las muchachas salen a bailar en las calles de su comunidad.
Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la señora  Josellesica una mujer trabajadora y alegre con deseos de ayudar a su familia.
Doña Josellesica la conocen mejor como Jessica ya que así le llaman sus compañeras de grupo y las personas de su comunidad.
Doña Jessica se dedica a la venta de  antojitos mexicanos, gelatinas, aguas frescas, frutas frescas y dulces, su mercancía la vende en la secundaria de su comunidad.
Doña Jessica nos cuenta que lleva vendiendo dos años vendiendo en la secundaria ya que anteriormente vendía su mercancía en el Kinder hace trece años.
Doña Jessica tiene treinta y dos años esta felizmente casada con el señor Ignacio un señor trabajador y humilde que se dedica a la siembra  con quien tiene  tres hijos  Jonatan de dieciséis años ,Javier de  trece años de edad y Alexander de dos años ellos son su mas grande inspiración.
Doña Jessenia nos cuenta que lo que mas le gusta  de su negocio es  cocinarles a los jóvenes y atenderlos con gusto.
Ella  nos cuenta como es que hace su trabajo : nos dice que  va ala secundaria acomoda su mercancía  y cuando los  jóvenes salen al recreó los atiende vendiéndoles comida y frutas  su hijo Javier  y su Sobrino Daniel le ayudan ya  que en  necesita tender a los jóvenes  rápido par que jueguen un poco y vuelvan a clases lo que mas  le gusta es que se siente como si fuera la mama de  todo esos jóvenes.
Nos dice que los maestro la poyaron para que pudiera vender en la escuela ya que había  dos señoras que también luchaban  por atender a los jóvenes pero gracias al apoyo de los maestro tubo la oportunidad de ser ella le elegida, nos dice que se sintió contenta y con el apoyo de fundacion mucho mas ya que podía comprar mas alimentos para los jóvenes.
Pidió el préstamo para la compra de mas frutas e ingredientes para la elaboración de comida como es: chile seco, Chile verdee masa para la elaboración de tortillas y quesos.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son:
Maria –quien se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Constancia-quien se dedica a la venta de pollo.
Amelia-quien se dedica a la venta de carne.
Alma-quien se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Amelia-quien se dedica a la venta de ropa.
Silvia-quien se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Elodia-quien se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Paulina-quien se dedica a la venta de pan.
Le da las gracias a fundacion por ayudar a la gente trabajadora y humilde con deseos de ayudar a sus hijos y darle una buena educación.
texts.en:
This group is called "Doña Amelia" and is comprised of nine kind, working women who run different businesses.  The members of the group live in a village called Camotinchan which has many green trees and a wide, beautiful river winding through it called "Los Tres" (because it has three streams).

Most of the men in the community grow corn, sesame, chili pepper, and tomato; and the women sell chicken, shoes and beef.  In the culture of Camotinchan, during carnival the boys and girls dance in the streets in their community.

One of the members of this group is Mrs. Josellesica, a cheerful, hard-working woman who wants to help her family.  She is known as Jessica among the group members and people in her communty.  She sells Mexican snacks, gelatin, water, fresh fruit and sweets at the high school in her community.  She says she has been selling there for two years, and before that she sold her goods at the kindergarten for thirteen years. 

Doña Jessica, 32, is happily married to Ignacio, a humble, hard-working man who is a farmer.  They have three children, Jonatan, 16, Javier, 13 and Alexander, 2, who are their greatest inspiration.

Jessica tells us that what she likes most about her business is cooking for the youngsters and treating them well.  She says her workday is as follows: she takes her goods to the high school and when the students begin recess she sells them food and fruit.  Her son, Javier, and her nephew, Daniel, help by attending to everyone more quickly so they can play a little before returning to class.  What she enjoys most is feeling like she's the mother of all the youngsters.

She adds that the teachers support her as far as being able to sell at school, since there were two ladies vying for the business; but thanks to the teachers she was the one chosen.  She is very content, and even moreso with the support of the foundation, which has allowed her to buy more merchandise.

The loan she is requesting is to buy more fruit and food ingredients such as dry chili pepper, green pepper, dough to make tortillas, and cheese. 

The other members of the group are:
Maria – who sells clothing.
Constancia - who sells chicken.
Amelia - who sells meat.
Alma - who sells Mexican snacks.
Amelia - who sells clothing.
Silvia - who sells Mexican snacks.
Elodia - who sells Mexican snacks.
Paulina - who sells bread.

They are grateful to the foundation for helping hard-working, humble people who want to support their children and give them a good education.

loans.use: To buy food ingredients.

loans.name: Edwin Wilfredo

texts.es:
Edwin, se dedica a la venta de hot dog y bebidas, él está viviendo con su esposa y un hijo de 6 años de edad, él  inicia su trabajo todos los días en la venta de hot dog y bebidas, los ofrece en las afueras de las universidades, tiene ya un buen número de clientes que prefieren sus productos.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería que sea necesaria para elaborar lo hot dog, como pan, salchichas, mortadela, aderezos, plasticos para empaque, esto le ayudara para que su negocio mantenga lo suficiente y continuar brindando su servicio de calidad.
La aspiración de Edwin es mejorar la calidad en sus productos, aumentar la clientela y que su familia pueda tener una condición de vida más estable.
texts.en:
Edwin's business is selling hot dogs and drinks.  He lives with his wife and 6-year-old son.  Every day he sells hot dogs and drinks outside the universities.  He has a good number of customers who are loyal to his products.

Edwin is requesting a loan to buy merchandise that he needs for making his hot dogs such as bread, sausages, bologna, seasonings and plastic wrap.  This will help him to have enough stock available and he will be able to continue providing a top-quality service.

Edwin's aspiration is to improve the quality of his products, increase his number of customers and for his family to have more stable living conditions.

loans.use: to buy bread, sausages, bologna, seasonings and plastic wrap

loans.name: Maria Cecilia

texts.es:
María Cecilia, tiene 19 años de edad, es soltera vive con sus padres en Guaranda, provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Arte y Cultura  “Wari” se encuentra en la comunidad de Larkaloma a 45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios

María se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de papas , maíz y a la producción de leche , además cría ganado.

Solicita el crédito para incrementar la producción, adquirir más ganado y comprar sales minerales, vitaminas, vacunas, además fertilizantes, insumos para los cultivos.

Las compras y ventas las realiza en la ciudad de Guaranda de manera diaria.
El sueño es tener su propia hacienda llena de ganado. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta  es el transporte.
En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y la época del año que más le gusta es la Navidad
texts.en:
María Cecilia is 19 years old, single, and lives with her parents in Guaranda, in Bolívar province.

The 'Wari' Art and Culture Commmunity Bank is located in Larkaloma community, 45 minutes from the office.  It has 11 members.

María is a farmer who grows potatoes and corn.  She is also a milk producer and raises livestock.  She is requesting this loan to increase her production.  She will acquire more livestock and buy mineral salts, vitamins and vaccines.  She will also buy fertilizers and farming supplies.

María makes her purchases and sales in the city of Guaranda every day.  Her dream is to have her own farm full of livestock.  The challenge that she faces is transport difficulties.

In her free time, María enjoys relaxing.  Her favorite time of year is Christmas.

loans.use: to acquire more livestock, to buy mineral salts, vitamins and vaccines, and to buy farming supplies

loans.name: Sonia Roxana

texts.es:
Sonia, administra una tienda de ropa, tiene dos hijos de 16 y 21 años de edad, su negocio tiene 8 años de existir en el mercado, lo instalo con créditos y poco a poco lo ha ido incrementando.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de blusas, pantalones, short, para surtir el negocio, ofreciendo a los clientes mayor variedad y nuevos estilos con la intensión de ganar más clientes en el mercado y de aumentar sus ganancias.
La aspiración de Sonia es que su negocio sea mayor, más rentable y además mejorar la condición económica de su familia.
texts.en:
Sonia runs a clothing shop and has two children, aged 16 and 21.  She started her business eight years ago with loans, and has been gradually expanding.

She is requesting a loan to buy blouses, trousers and shorts to stock the shop, in an aim to offer her customers more variety and new styles.  This is to increase her market share and profits.

Sonia's goal is to make her business larger and more profitable, and improve her family's economy.

loans.use: To buy blouses, trousers and shorts.

loans.name: Kamene

texts.en:
Kamene is a 47-year-old married woman. She has five children ranging in age from 13 to 27. She describes herself as social and talkative. 

Kamene operates a retail store where she sells cereals such as maize, beans, black beans, etc. She has been involved in this business for 10 years and employs one staff member. 

Kamene's business is located within a busy town and her primary customers are local residents of Mwingi. She describes her biggest business challenge as insufficient funds for expanding her business and hopes that with this loan, she will be able to improve the business. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more maize. Her business goal is to sell cereals at wholesale prices within five years.

loans.use: to buy more maize for selling.

loans.name: Pod Natura  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Prod Natura está formado por 4 socias y 3 socios, laboran diariamente en diferentes actividades y también una en común que es la venta de productos naturales, realizan su trabajo para aportar a la economía de sus hogares y salir en adelante con sus familias. Viven por diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que es considerada como la tercera ciudad de mayor importancia económica del país, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su clima es frió, su gente es amable, gentil y mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Una de las aocias de este grupo es la Señora. María Eugenia, vive por el sector de Misicata en la ciudad de Cuenca, tiene 21 años, es casada y aun no tiene hijos. Su esposo labora como albañil, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
La Señora. María Eugenia estudió 3 años en una academia de costura y se encuentra ejerciendo su profesión hace un año, labora en una fábrica que confección jeans, trabaja de lunes a sábados desde las 7 hasta las 6 de la tarde. En sus tiempos libres se dedica a la venta de productos naturales de la marca Teans, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 2 años.

Este es su primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada por su suegra. Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de productos Naturales para continuar con esta  actividad.
 
Su meta es tener casa propia.

Por esta ocasión nos acompaña en la foto un joven con camiseta negra que es hijo de una de las socias.
texts.en:
The Pro Natura community bank is made up of four women and three men.  They work every day in different business activities and also in one they share in common which is selling natural products.  They work in order to contribute financially to their households and provide for their families.  The members live in different parts of the city of Cuenca.  This city is considered to be the third most important city in the country from an economic point of view.  In December 1999 it was named a World Heritage Site.  It has a cold climate but its people are kind and friendly.  They maintain their culture and traditions.

One of the members of this group is María Eugenia who lives in Misicata sector, in the city of Cuenca.  She is 21 years old, married, and doesn't yet have any children.  Her husband is a construction worker.  They do not own their own home but live in rental accommodation.

María Eugenia studied in a sewing academy for three years and has been working in her profession for one year.  She works in a factory that makes jeans, from Monday to Saturday, from 7.00am to 6.00pm.  In her free time she sells Teans-brand natural products.  She has been in this business for two years.

This is María Eugenia's first loan from her community bank which she was invited to join by her mother-in-law.  She will invest her loan in buying natural products so that she can continue working in her business.  Her goal is to own her own home.

On this occasion, we are joined in the photo by a young man in a black t-shirt who is the son of one of the members.

loans.use: to buy natural products

loans.name: Dounia

texts.en:
Dounia is a 33-year-old Lebanese woman. She’s single and lives with her parents. She only has one working sibling. She cooperates with her brother to satisfy the family's needs. For this reason, she strives to work really hard. 

In 2004, Dounia opened her own grocery shop. She has a wide variety of goods and products as well as a fair number of loyal customers. Today, she’s asking for a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase added products for her shop such as soft drinks, dairy products and many other items. 

Dounia notes that this loan will increase her sales and therefore her profits and revenue. In the future, she plans to open her own mini-market.

loans.use: to purchase added products for her shop such as soft drinks, dairy products and many other items.

loans.name: Bassam

texts.en:
Bassam is a 45-year-old, Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and four children, one of whom works while the others attend school.

Bassam is the main income provider for his family and the one taking care of them. Bassam opened his own painting shop in 2011 where he sells all types of paintings. 

Today, he intends to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase the needed quantity of paintings for his shop. In this way, he will be capable of responding rapidly to his customers' demands and therefore earn higher returns. In the future, Bassam plans to work as a wholesaler and sell paintings to the neighboring shops.

loans.use: to purchase the needed quantity of paintings for his shop.

loans.name: One Man Group

texts.en:
This is 33-year-old Florence from Harare. She is married and has three children, two of whom attend school. Florence runs a retail business selling infant apparel. She has operated her business for three years. She says the main challenge she faces is client liquidity. 

Florence has requested a loan of $500 to buy infant apparel for resale. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to assist in upkeep of her family. In the future, Florence plans to open a shop in town.

loans.use: to buy infant apparel for resale.

loans.name: Joel

texts.en:
Joel is a 30-year-old businessman, who lives in Juba Yei. He is married with 1 child, age of 3 months, who does not go to school. 

Joel runs a clinic store business. He has been in the business for 8 years and has 1 employee. Joel heard about Finance South Sudan from a radio advert. He is taking a loan of 2,000 SDG to purchase more items like general drugs and many others. In addition to this business, Joel is a farmer; he grows the food that he is selling as his other source of income. 

In 5 years time, Joel would like to hope for better support from Finance Sudan so that he can have a better business to be expanded. His major challenges include low income rate and government plans of relocating the market.

Joel says that he is very happy for Finance South Sudan, for good support and God bless the company to grow bigger and bigger.

loans.use: to purchase more items like general drugs and many others

loans.name: Thomas Momanyi

texts.en: Thomas is a married man. He has 2 children with ages ranging from 10 to 15 years. He describes himself to be a principled man. He operates a Nissan and he provides transportation services. He has been involved in this business for 2 years and employs 1 staff member. His business is located within a busy town and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the high price of fuel. He will use the 20,000 KES loan to buy Nissan spare parts. His business goal is to buy another Nissan to increase the mode of transportation.

loans.use: to buy motor vehicle spare parts.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio, es comerciante de ropa caballeros y niños, vive con su esposa en casa de la suegra, tiene dos años de estar en el negocio, lo realiza de forma ambulante y su esposa le ayuda a atenderlo.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de pantalones, camisas, ropa interior, ropa para niños, el préstamo le ayudara además a mejorar la disponibilidad y poder tener más mercadería, así sus ventas y ganancias. 
La aspiración de Julio es que a través del negocio ir arreglando poco a poco la vivienda que actualmente está construida de lamina.
texts.en:
Julio sells men’s and children’s clothing. He lives with his wife in his mother-in-law’s house. He has been in this business for two years. He is a door-to-door salesman and his wife helps him attend to the business. 

This loan will be for the purchase of pants, shirts, underwear, and children’s clothes.  The loan will also help him improve what is available and to be able to have more merchandise, and that way have greater sales and earnings.

Julio’s dream is that through the business he will be able to fix up his house, which right now is made of sheet metal, little by little.

loans.use: To purchase pants, shirts, underwear, and children’s clothing.

loans.name: Manale

texts.en: Manale is a 32-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and two school-age children. She cooperates with her husband in order to satisfy their family needs. Manale started to work as a tailor from her home in 2007 after having many years of experience in this domain. As for her husband, he has been serving in the Lebanese army since 1996. Today, she’s requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase a new tailoring machine, which will allow her to increase her production and therefore her revenues. In the future, she plans to open her own clothing shop.

loans.use: to purchase a new tailoring machine

loans.name: Khadijeh

texts.en: Khadijeh is a 39-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and two children, who are still attending school. In 2006, she decided to start her own home business and support her husband with the heavy costs of life. She has been working in the agricultural field, specializing in installing plastic tents, and has the ambition to grow up and succeed in this domain. Today, she’s looking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new inventory such as pesticides and seeds for her lands in addition to plastic tents. In the future, she plans to open her own agricultural supplies shop.

loans.use: to purchase new inventory such as pesticides and seeds for her lands, in addition to plastic tents

loans.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.es:
María Concepción, de 22 años, es soltera tiene una hija y vive con su hermana y la hija en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Arte y Cultura  “Wari” se encuentra en la comunidad de Larkaloma a 45 minutos  de la oficina, está conformada por 11 socios.

María se dedica a la producción de leche, queso y crianza de pollos, además al cultivo de papas, habas y arveja.

Solicita el crédito para comprar una ternera y así aumentar la producción de leche y poder adquirir algunos insumos  como fertilizantes, líquidos y mejorar sus cultivos.

Las compras y las ventas lo hacen en Guaranda semanalmente.El sueño es poder tener un vehículo que sea propio. Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan  es el transporte.

En el tiempo libre le gusta tejer, y la época del año más esperada es el  carnaval.
texts.en:
María Concepción is 22 years old, single, and has one daughter.  She lives with her sister and her child in Guaranda, in Bolívar province.

The 'Wari' Art and Culture Community Bank is located in Larkaloma community, 45 minutes from the office.  It has 11 members.

María is a milk producer.  She also makes cheese, raises chickens and grows potatoes, beans and peas.  She is requesting this loan to buy a calf so that she can increase her milk production.  She will also acquire some supplies such as fertilizers and liquids with which to improve her crops.

María makes her purchases and sales in Guaranda every week.  Her dream is to own her own vehicle as the challenge she faces is transportation difficulties.

In her free time, María enjoys knitting.  The time of year she most looks forward to is Carnival time.

loans.use: to buy a calf and thereby increase her milk production.  She will also acquire some supplies such as fertilizers and liquids in order to improve her crops

loans.name: Téliépa

texts.fr:
Téliépa est une femme âgé(e) de 30 ans. Elle est célibataire et a un enfant de 04ans.
Téliépa travaille comme revendeuse de chaussures et habits  depuis 2009. Elle exerce seule son activité au marché et s’approvisionne à Lomé. Sa difficulté est la concurrence sur le marché.
Téliépa a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des chaussures et habits. Elle veut renforcer son activité et mieux s’occuper de son enfant.
texts.en:
Téliépa is 30 years old, and she is a single mother of a 4-year-old child. She has been working as a shoe and clothing reseller since 2009. She works alone at the market and she buys her merchandise in Lomé. Her main difficulty is the competition. 

Téliépa is seeking her first loan from WAGES to buy shoes and clothing. She wants to strengthen her business and better provide for her child.

loans.use: to buy shoes and clothing for resale.

loans.name: Luis Enrique Flores Rojas

texts.es:
Luis tiene 27 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido en cualquier época del año, así como también es visitada por infinidad de turistas ya que allí se encuentra la “laguna de Huacachina”, un Oasis en medio del desierto con unas dunas hermosas, también es una ciudad donde hay mucha agricultura, en especial el cultivo de Algodón, uva y espárragos. Cuando dispone de tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y vecinos y también aprovechar para comer uno de sus platos favoritos. 

Con mucho entusiasmo luis trabaja en su negocio como chofer de taxi y también haciendo colectivo, el cual consiste en transitar por una ruta especifica e ir captando pasajeros que desean ir por algunos de los lugares de su ruta; el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas diarias y atiende alrededor de 30 clientes en el día, asimismo tiene una mototaxi la cual compro con mucho esfuerzo y en oportunidades la alquila con los cual tiene un pequeño ingreso; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es, muy amable y respetuoso con sus clientes y sobre todo porque se levanta muy temprano y como dice el dicho al que madruga Dios lo ayuda.

Luis está muy agradecido con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda el podrá realizar mantenimiento y reparación de su vehículo, lo que le permitirá tener un vehículo más seguro para los clientes y podrá mejorar sus ingresos con lo cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir trabajando para poder realizar su más grande sueño:” Tener una empresa de transporte”.
texts.en:
Luis is 27 years old and lives in the city of Ica.  This city experiences hot weather year round and is visited by a large number of tourists as it is home to the 'Huacachina Lake', an oasis in the middle of the desert which has some beautiful dunes.  It is also a city where there is a lot of agriculture, particularly cotton, grape and asparagus cultivation.  When Luis has any free time, he enjoys playing soccer with his friends and neighbors and also eating one of his favorite dishes.

Luis puts a lot of enthusiasm into his business as a taxi driver.  He also works 'haciendo colectivo' which means that he drives on a specific route and picks up passengers who want to travel to any of the places on the route.
